comments:
I downloaded equinox and installed it.

I then went to the update manager and installed everything from the equinox discovery site.

After this, going to About Eclipse Platform Plug-ins triggers several errors:

I have the following exception on the console:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.birt.report.viewer 4 0 2007-07-02 15:45:32.584
